name: Holiday Cheer Mini Sweater
description: A cute mini sweater that will complement the previously released mini hat and mini mitts patterns. Mix and match your colors or try some fun embroidery, the options are endless. Happy Holidays!
full_text: A cute mini sweater that will complement the previously released mini hat and mini mitts patterns. Mix and match your colors or try some fun embroidery, the options are endless. Happy Holidays! EXPERIENCE LEVEL: Advanced beginner MATERIALS: WOOLSTOK (WORSTED) BUNDLE (100% Fine Highland Wool, 21 mini hanks; 5g/12 yards): 1 bundle (Holiday Cheer) Tapestry needle FINISHED MEASUREMENTS: CIRCUMFERENCE: 3”, HEIGHT: 2½” COLOR SHOWN: Cast Iron No. 1300 Gravel Road No. 1302 Highland Fleece No. 1303 Wild Thyme No. 1306 Earth Ivy No. 1309 Cranberry Compote No. 1310 Red Rock No. 1315
